articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of KPA Large Combined Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of KPA Large Combined Unit
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected the command of KPA Large Combined Unit 264.
					 He went round the monument to the revolutionary activities of leader Kim Jong Il, the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the unit.
					
					 Watching the photos of successive commanding officers of the unit including anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and heroes produced by it, he looked back on its proud path shining with victory and glory. After looking at trophy banners, he said that there are so many banners, an indication that the corps has performed a lot of feats in combat and political training and sites of socialist construction.
					
					 Praising the unit for having built well the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to its history, he noted that there may be advanced and backward units in other affairs but there should be no superior or inferior units in building ideological education base and conducting education through it. He called on it to let its service personnel deeply grasp the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by leading the army so that they may register shining successes in making combat preparations and bolstering up combat capabilities.
					
					 He looked round the room for the study of military affair and operation command room before listening to the report on the unit's operation plan for defence.
					
					 Noting that the unit is steadily increasing the capabilities of the commanding officers and its staff members to organize and command operation actions as intended by the party, he instructed them to put utmost spurs to rounding off combat preparations with the firm viewpoint and stand to be fully responsible for them before the party.
					
					 Saying that the unit has a very important duty to perform, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for increasing the unit's combat capability in every way. He gave precious instructions to spruce up the building of the command and thoroughly establish the method of commanding and managing the unit applied by the anti-Japanese guerillas.
					
					 He went round the library and soldiers' hall of the unit.
					
					 Underscoring the need to operate the soldiers' hall well, he said it is necessary for the revolutionaries to have the ideological and moral pabulum just as a man cannot live without food. He instructed the unit to direct efforts to strengthening the five-point education set forth by the party in order to train all the service persons as indomitable fighters who do not abandon their revolutionary faith unto their death.
					
					 He went round soldiers' room, room for education and mess hall of the company directly under the large combined unit to take warm care of their living.
					
					 He called for waging a dynamic drive to improve the soldiers' diet as supply service is important for rounding off the combat preparations. He instructed the unit to successfully cultivate vegetables and bean and, at the same time, organize the work for conducting well not only fisheries and stock breeding but also fish breeding.
					
					 He gave a pair of binoculars, machine gun and automatic rifle to the unit as gifts and had a significant photo session with service personnel.
					
					 Learning that the soldiers on military duty were not able to take part in the photo session, he said he was reluctant to leave the unit, noting how regretful they must be. He showed such profound loving care for them as sparing time and inviting all of them to join in another photo session. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So and Jang Chang Hwa.

articles.title: DPRK NDC Policy Department Clarifies Its Stand on Ill-famed "May 24 Step" of S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK NDC Policy Department Clarifies Its Stand on Ill-famed "May 24 Step" of S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Five years have passed since matchless confrontational maniac and traitor Lee Myung Bak cooked up the "May 24 step", pushing the north-south ties into a phase of confrontation. 
					 The "May 24 step" was the anti-nation, anti-peace and anti-reunification one for escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north, an unprecedented one in light of the circumstances of its fabrication and the course of its implementation.
					
					 What matters is Park Geun Hye and her party's argument that if it is to be lifted, there must be such "responsible step" as the north's "admission", "apology" and "assurances for preventing recurrence". They went the lengths of blustering that their stand is immutable.
					
					 The Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission in a statement on Sunday clarified its principled stand as regards the "May 24 step".
					
					 The statement said:
					
					1. The "May 24 step" is an undisguised denial of the historic June 15 joint declaration, the achievement common to the nation, and its action program the October 4 declaration.
					
					Traitor Lee Myung Bak and his party branded the June 15 era of reunification as a "lost decade" and blustered they will bring a "decade of confrontation" to freeze the compatriots' enthusiasm for reunification.
					
					 This blustering was proved by the Cheonan warship sinking case and the "May 24 step" that ensued.
					
					 Five years have passed since then and the chief of the Chongwadae has also changed.
					
					 But the May 24 step remains a cancer-like entity, blocking the improved relations between the north and the south, spoiling the national concord and unity and escalating the confrontation and tension.
					
					This clearly shows that Park Geun Hye and her party are just as same as Lee Myung Bak.
					
					2. The "May 24 step" is a measure for confrontation that was fabricated under the pretext of the sinking of warship "Cheonan".
					
					The step based on fabrication can not but be a measure for confrontation. 
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we'd like to urge with courtesy Park and her party as follows:
					
					 If they have any ground with which they can prove the DPRK's responsibility for the sinking case, they should respond to its demand to jointly look into the case in the eyes of the whole nation and the world.
					
					 There would be no excuse whatsoever for them to decline our demand, if they are not afraid.
					
					 The investigation into the truth will be easier as the hull of Cheonan warship which had been broken into two parts was salvaged and placed on the land.
					
					 We still keep a powerful inspection group of the DPRK NDC ready to get down to joint investigation into the case.
					
					 If Park and her party turn down this just demand of the DPRK, that will only be their admission of the case as their own farce. The "May 24 step" should, therefore, be naturally lifted.
					
					 3. The ill-famed "May 24 step" is a product of political intrigues which should be thrown into a dumping ground of history.
					
					 The step is a product of political swindles against the nation, reunification and peace which no one wants, and the biggest trouble of all the Koreans.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her party should admit before the whole nation the crimes against fellow countrymen they committed by clinging to the "May 24 step" and throw it away into a dumping ground of history.
					
					 They talk nonsense such as "dialogue first and lift of the step next", only revealing their cynical ploy to push the the north-south dialogue to another theatre of confrontation. But this is just a waste of time.
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea should rise up as one in the nationwide struggle to have the "May 24 step" lifted.
					
					 The great turn and avenue to the improvement of the north-south relations depend on the lifting of the step.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Women's Grand March Pass through Kaesong
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Women's Grand March Pass through Kaesong
						
 Kaesong, May 24 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 2015 international women's grand march for the reunification and peace in Korea passed through Kaesong on Sunday. They left Pyongyang on Saturday.
					 They marched toward Panmunjom, holding placards bearing the letters "Let's build independent, peaceful, friendly new world!" and "Let's strengthen solidarity with world peace-loving forces!"
					
					 People of all social standings saw off the participants in the march in streets of Kaesong, waving flowers and hands.
					
					 At Panmunjom the members of the delegation to the grand march went round the monument on which President Kim Il Sung's signature reflective of his noble desire and noble life is inscribed and the hall where the armistice agreement was signed.
					
					 They held a press conference before crossing over the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 On Saturday they visited the Koryo Museum and the Mausoleum of King Wang Kon.

articles.title: DPRK Boxer Bags Gold Medal at World Junior and Youth Women's Boxing Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Boxer Bags Gold Medal at World Junior and Youth Women's Boxing Championship
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK boxer Won Un Gyong bagged a gold medal at the 2015 world juvenile and youth women's boxing championship held in Taipei of China from May 16.
					 The championship brought together more than 340 women's boxers from 46 countries including the DPRK, Kazakhstan and Romania and regions.
					
					 At the juvenile 46 kg category Won Un Gyong defeated her Russian rival 2:1 in the semi-finals and her Turkish rival 3:0 in the finals.
					
					 Another DPRK boxer Kim Un Jong bagged a silver medal at the youth 48 kg category.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korea Tundra of Human Rights
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korea Tundra of Human Rights
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group in collusion with outside forces including the U.S. are vociferating about "nuclear threat from the north" and "provocation". It is also spreading a story of "human rights" groundlessly slandering the dignity and social system of the DPRK, and kicking up madcap campaign of confrontation. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 No one will ever lend an ear to Park Geun Hye's invectives against the north over "human rights". 
					
					 South Korea is the worst tundra of human rights in the world where democracy and human rights are most wantonly violated. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye is a rare hooligan who turned south Korea into dark society where democracy and justice are violated and fascism and oppression stalk through the revival of the notorious "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 Park who has carried forward the baton of "yusin" pursues strong-arm rule, oppression rule, as in the days of "yusin" dictatorship. She is suppressing and stamping out at will the organizations and personages going against her policy even a bit. 
					
					 She is a criminal who mercilessly violated the rights to existence and dignity of the south Korean people and turned south Korean society into a tomb of human rights through unpopular rule. 
					
					 It is an intolerable mockery of human rights for the hordes of cruel human butchers and human rights abusers to slander "human rights situation" in the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays Park Geun Hye for Slandering Humanitarianism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays Park Geun Hye for Slandering Humanitarianism
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea in a recent "congratulatory speech" said she is trying to alleviate the "pain of divided family members in their advanced ages." Earlier, she invited to Chongwadae the riff-raffs, representatives of "people from northern provinces" where she said the north is denying dialogue as regards the "divided family" issue. She went the lengths of misrepresenting the reality, giving impression that the reunion of divided families and their relatives has not yet been realized due to the DPRK.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says the puppet authorities have no face to talk about the reunion of the divided families and their relatives.
					
					 The reunion of divided families and their relatives has not yet been realized, a tragedy caused by the puppet group which is keen on escalating confrontation with compatriots in the north while abusing the north-south relations for meeting their sinister political purposes, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Clear is why the puppet group raised the reunion issue of divided families and their relatives though they have driven the situation into the worst phase to prevent any dialogue and cooperation from being realized between the north and the south. They are seeking to shift the blame for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations on to the DPRK by behaving as if they were interested in the humanitarian issue, and to appease the people's mindset in a bid to tide over the daily deepening regime's crisis. It is foolish for them to think that they can deceive the world people with such ridiculous remarks.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group will be made to pay a dear price for the unpardonable crimes it committed by blocking the reunion of divided families and their relatives.

articles.title: U.S. Urged Not to Fool World with Deceptive Farce
articles.content:
U.S. Urged Not to Fool World with Deceptive Farce 
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of State Kerry in the recent review conference of the parties to the NPT said the U.S. has 4 017 nuclear warheads, 87 less than that in September 2013 and 500 less than that in January 2009 when the Obama Administration took office. He unveiled the plan to dismantle 2 500 nuclear warheads by 2022, saying this number includes those that had already been dismantled until 2014 and those under dismantlement now.
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 World public and experts comment that the U.S. opening of the documents related to its nuclear activities is nothing but a diplomatic gesture aimed to give impression that it is abiding by its duty under the NPT. They expressed skepticism about the credibility of the materials presented by the U.S. 
					
					 It is beyond the U.S. capacity to maintain and manage nuclear warheads that had been overproduced and stockpiled during the Cold War period for nuclear arms race with the Soviet Union. 
					
					 The crafty U.S. found a way-out in improving quality, not in quantity increase and started reexamining its nuclear strategy. 
					
					 The U.S. has already rounded off the production plan for a variety of updated and highly sophisticated warheads to be mounted on nuclear weapons or has begun their production. 
					
					 It is the arch criminal of worldwide nuclear proliferation and arms race as it is pushing forward the modernization of nukes, bringing about nuclear nightmare to the world and enforcing massive exports of weapons by intentionally aggravating the international situation. 
					
					 As the international community unanimously demands, the U.S. must stop such a mean behavior as fooling the world with deceptive talk about "world without nuclear weapons" and "peace."

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Slandering DPRK's Measure to Bolster up Nuclear Deterrent
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Slandering DPRK's Measure to Bolster up Nuclear Deterrent
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in a statement clarified its principled stand as regards the U.S. and its allies' reckless action of taking issue with the successful test-fire of ballistic missile by a strategic submarine.
					 As soon as this statement was reported, the south Korean puppet group is raising hue and cry over a "serious threat" and crying out for "a halt to provocations" almost every day. It has gone the lengths of sending what it called "message" to the UNSC.
					
					 Even Park Geun Hye is taking the lead in inciting anti-DPRK confrontation racket, vociferating about "counteraction against unpredictable event" and complaining about "violation of UN resolution."
					
					 In the mean time puppet military gangsters are letting loose a string of invectives about "scorched earth operations" and "containment" during their visits to forefront areas, the hottest spots, for escalating tensions. They are openly revealing an attempt to introduce THAAD into south Korea from the U.S., the plan they dared not raise for fear public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement issued on Sunday termed the provocative act of the puppet group echoing the reckless remarks of the U.S. ridiculous behavior a last-ditch effort of the pro-U.S. lackeys taken aback by the leap forward made by the DPRK in bolstering up its military muscle.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is a horde of despicable traitors who have sold off the dignity and interests of the nation and increased the tension and danger of a war on the Korean peninsula as a shock brigade in the moves to stifle the DPRK, kowtowing to its American master. It has neither elementary face nor qualifications to say this or that about the DPRK's inviolable nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear armed force for self-defence can never be an object of accusation as it is means of justice for protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and the puppet group should know at least that the treasured nuclear sword of the DPRK can never be dismantled no matter how desperately the group decries.
					
					 The nuclear deterrence of the DPRK has not posed any threat to anybody but has performed the most just and responsible mission to check the U.S. wild ambition for hegemony on the forefront and preserve regional peace and stability.
					
					 The puppet group is slandering the DPRK's measure to bolster up its military capability and desperately talking about "sanctions" by abusing even the name of the international community in a bid to cover up its despicable nature of straining the situation in the region including the Korean peninsula but no force can bar the DPRK from exercising its legitimate right to self-defence.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group would be well advised to stop acting recklessly, pondering over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its futile action of taking issue with the DPRK's measure to bolster up its nuclear deterrence of justice.

articles.title: Indonesian Party Accuses U.S. of Its Attempted Deployment of THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
Indonesian Party Accuses U.S. of Its Attempted Deployment of THAAD in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia made public a statement on May 18 denouncing the U.S. for its moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. attempt to deploy THAAD in south Korea, first overseas deployment in the wake of that in the U.S. mainland and on Guam, is related to its moves to establish MD system, an important component of its strategy to dominate the Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The ulterior intention of the U.S. is to forward-deploy high-performance radar in south Korea and thus promptly detect and track missile-related moves of its rivals in Eurasia.
					
					 If THAAD is deployed in south Korea, military tensions and confrontation would further escalate on the Korean peninsula and stability be harassed in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The statement extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle, recognizing the DPRK's new line on simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts as the most just one for foiling the U.S. repeated moves to stifle and isolate the DPRK by force of arms and defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean "Government" Responsible for Massacre of People by GIs
articles.content:
S. Korean "Government" Responsible for Massacre of People by GIs 
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Seoul High Court ruled the south Korean "government" is under responsibility to make reparation for the massacre committed by GIs in Phohang, North Kyongsang Province during the last Korean war, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on May 18.
					 The U.S. imperialists shelled from the sea the civilian refugees on the seaside of Phohang in September 1950, killing hundreds.
					
					 Bereaved families filed a lawsuit against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 In face of the protest of the bereaved families, the court could not but investigate the then massacre and ruled that the authorities should make reparation for the U.S. naval bombardment, saying that the motive of the bombardment was the requirement from the ROK army which alluded to the existence of the People's Army soldiers among the refugees.

articles.title: Chongryon Vice-Chairman Is Confident of Victory of Patriotic Cause
articles.content:
Chongryon Vice-Chairman Is Confident of Victory of Patriotic Cause 
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Sure victory is in store for the patriotic cause of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) vigorously advancing along the road of Juche and patriotism for prosperity being blessed with Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					 Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon who is leading the group of Koreans in Japan for expressing thanks to the homeland on the 60th anniversary of Chongryon, said this in an interview with KCNA on Sunday. 
					
					 Pae extended the warmest respect to the great Generalissimos, pioneer and leader of the movement of overseas compatriots' organization of Juche type on the occasion of the anniversary.
					
					 Noting that Kim Il Sung formed Chongryon on May 25, Juche 44 (1955), taking deep care of the Koreans in Japan who did not know what to do in stormy alien land. 
					
					 After the formation of Chongryon the movement of Koreans in Japan could dynamically advance along the way of Juche without vacillation in any storms. 
					
					 It is impossible to think about the existence of Chongryon and national rights and happiness of Koreans in Japan without the President. 
					
					 Leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il is associated with the history of Chongryon that has covered the proud road of victory and glory. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il firmly defended Chongryon, legacy left by the President out of patriotism, and saved Chongryon and Koreans in Japan from crisis. 
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding Songun politics, Chongryon could overcome all the ordeals and storms of history and display its existence and might with the single-minded unity and patriotic advance. 
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, the patriotic movement of Chongryon is now steadily developing to a new phase. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un, benevolent father of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, represents their life and future. 
					
					 It is great glory and happiness for Chongryon and Koreans in Japan to uphold another great leader in the van of the movement of Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 We will eternally hold in high esteem the great Generalissimos and further strengthen Chongryon as invincible patriotic ranks under the leadership of the Marshal.

articles.title: U.S. Is Chief Culprit of Kwangju Massacre: German Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Is Chief Culprit of Kwangju Massacre: German Organization
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on May 18 posted on its website an article titled "The U.S. is a chief culprit of Kwangju massacre".
					 The article recalled the fact that a large number of people were brutally killed after they took to the streets for the democratic freedom and rights against the fascist dictatorship in May 35 years ago. This was the tragedy of history engineered by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. was behind the massacre, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Even Americans who witnessed the massacre testified to the fact that the U.S. was a chief culprit who quelled the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					
					 Decades have passed since the uprising but the U.S., the mastermind of the massacre, has stationed their aggression armed forces in south Korea.
					
					 The Korean people will never tolerate the U.S. brutal atrocities that have lasted century after century but put an end to the U.S. colonial presence in south Korea.

articles.title: Korean Folk Song "Arirang" Introduced by Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Korean Folk Song "Arirang" Introduced by Austrian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK posted on its website an article titled "'Arirang' and Korean nation" on May 17.
					 The article said:
					
					 "Arirang" is a typical folk song loved by the Korean nation.
					
					 During the colonial rule of Korea by the Japanese imperialists the song reflected the resistance of the Koreans against the aggressors.
					
					 The Korean people built new democratic Korea after its liberation and pushed forward the postwar reconstruction and socialist construction, singing this song.
					
					 Songs "Arirang of Songun" and "Arirang of Prosperity" were also created and sung by the Koreans.
					
					 Those songs highly praised the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il who defended the destiny of the county and the nation, and reflected the happiness of the Korean people enjoying their lives in socialist Korea.
					
					 Koreans in the north and the south and overseas sang the song "Arirang of Reunification" with the ardent yearnings for the reunification in the nation's joint events for reunification.
					
					 Korean folk song "Arirang" was registered as a typical intangible cultural heritage of humanity at the 9th Session of the Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of the UNESCO held in Paris.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted by Peruvian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Part of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address related with Korea's reunification was posted by the Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship on its website on May 18.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de gran unidad combinada 264 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de gran unidad combinada 264 de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la comandancia de la gran unidad combinada 264 del EPC.
					Recorrio la lapida a la actividad historico-revolucionaria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					Viendo las fotos de los martires revolucionarios antijaponeses y otros comandantes de la gran unidad combinada y los heroes de la unidad, recordo una trayectoria orgullosa de la citada unidad y mirando muchas banderas de triunfo, subrayo que tal numero nos constata que el cuerpo es la unidad que ha realizado muchos meritos en los ejercicios militares y politicos y los campos de construccion socialista.
					
					Tras evaluar el hecho de que la unidad acondiciono bien las salas de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y de presentacion del historial, anadio que en otras labores podran existir una unidad adelantada y otra atrasada, pero no deben existir en la educacion mediante la base de educacion ideologica y agrego que debe inculcar en cada corazon de los militares las indelebles hazanas de direccion militar de los Generalisimos y perfeccionar los preparativos de combate y combatividad.
					
					Y estuvo en las salas de estudio militar y de mando operacional donde escucho el informe del plan de operacion de defensa.
					
					Dijo que la unidad esta mejorando constantemente la capacidad directiva de los comandantes y los funcionarios del estado mayor conforme a la voluntad del partido e indico que deben dar acicate al perfeccionamiento de los preparativos del combate a partir del firme punto de vista y posicion de responsabilizarse enteramente ante el partido los preparativos del combate de la unidad.
					
					Diciendo que es muy importante el deber de la gran unidad combinada, presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en el fortalecimiento por todos los medios de la combatividad de la unidad y dio las preciosas instrucciones para acondicionar mas bien y establecer la estricta manera de direccion y administracion de la unidad al estilo de Guerrilla Antijaponesa.
					
					Tambien hizo recorrido por la biblioteca y la casa militar de la unidad.
					
					Al decir la necesidad de administrar bien la casa militar, se refirio a que los revolucionarios deben tener el alimento ideo-espiritual como la persona no puede vivir sin comer e instruyo que deben esforzarse por fortalecer la educacion de 5 tipos presentada por el Partido a fin de formar a todos los militares como los combatientes indoblegables que no renuncien el credo en la revolucion r aunque mueran
					
					Recorrio el dormitorio, la sala de educacion y el comedor de la compania subordinada a la gran unidad.
					
					Es importante el trabajo de servicio de abastecimiento para los militares en el perfeccionamiento de los preparativos de combate, senalo y continuo que deben desarrollar una energica lucha por mejorar la vida alimentaria de los uniformados y hacer bien el cultivo de de hortaliza, soya, pesca, ganaderia y piscicultura.
					
					Dio a la gran unidad combinada binoculos, ametralladora y fusil automatico y tomo una foto de recuerdo junto a los militares.
					
					Tras recibir el parte de que no participaron en la filmacion unos militares que estaban cumpliendo la tarea militar, llamo a ellos y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So y Jang Chang Hwa.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia a titeres surcoreanos que acusan fortalecimiento de disuasivo nuclear de RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia a titeres surcoreanos que acusan fortalecimiento de disuasivo nuclear de RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas satelites acusan el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de proyectil balistico de submarino estrategico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC expuso su clara posicion de principios a traves de la declaracion del vocero del Departamento de Politica.
					Al enterarse de tal declaracion, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos habla tanto en estos dias de "amenaza rigurosa", "cese de provocacion", etc. y se comporta groseramente emitiendo "mensaje" al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Para colmo, Park Geun-hye esta al frente de campana de confrontacion anti-RPDC insistiendo en "violacion de resolucion de la ONU", etc.
					
					Por otra parte, los gangsteres militares titeres del Sur de Corea agudizan la tension hablando de "quemadura total", "opresion", etc. haciendo recorrido por la zona candente lindante con la primera linea del frente y exponiendo su intencion de introducir el THAAD de Estados Unidos en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Senalo en su declaracion fechada 24, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) y lo califico de locura provocativa de los lacayos pro-yanquis, muy atemorizados por el vertiginoso fortalecimiento de las fuerzas militares de la RPDC.
					
					La banda titere surcoreana vendio la dignidad e intereses de la nacion a su amo norteamericano y actuo de brigada de choque del imperio agrandando la tension y el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, senala el documento y anade:
					
					No tiene ninguna honra elemental de acusar el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo.
					
					Uno que no tiene fuerzas autodefensivas sufrira la desgracia y calamidad en la disputa, conflicto y guerra, ocurridos por la arbitrariedad y el despotismo de los imperialistas, lo cual es una realidad seria de hoy.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares autodefensivas de la RPDC sirven de medios justos para defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion. Por eso, no pueden ser acusadas por nadie ni renunciadas por la acusacion de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Hoy en dia, las fuerzas de disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC no amenazan a nadie sino cumplen la mision mas justa y responsable que detiene en la primera linea la ambicion de EE.UU. de tomar la heguemonia y salvaguarda la paz y la estabilidad de la region.
					
					La banda surcoreana denigra las medidas de fortalecimiento de las fuerzas militares de la RPDC para justificar su sucia naturaleza que empeora la situacion regional y habla de la "sancion" abusando del nombre de la sociedad internacional, pero, nadie puede detener el ejercicio de la justa soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de las consecuencias catastroficas que emanen de tal comportamiento de acusar el fortalecimiento de justo disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC.
